AttachPolicy.title: AttachPolicy
AttachPolicy.summary: Attaches a policy to an object, which can be a RAM user, RAM user group, or RAM role. After you attach a policy to an object, the object has the operation permissions on the resources in a specific resource group or within a specific Alibaba Cloud account.

BindSecureMobilePhone.title: BindSecureMobilePhone
BindSecureMobilePhone.summary: Binds a mobile phone number to a member of the resource account type in a resource directory for security purposes.

CancelChangeAccountEmail.title: CancelChangeAccountEmail
CancelChangeAccountEmail.summary: Cancels the email address change of a member.

CancelCreateCloudAccount.title: CancelCreateCloudAccount
CancelCreateCloudAccount.summary: Cancels the creation of a cloud account.

CancelPromoteResourceAccount.title: CancelPromoteResourceAccount
CancelPromoteResourceAccount.summary: Cancels the upgrade from a resource account to a cloud account.

ChangeAccountEmail.title: ChangeAccountEmail
ChangeAccountEmail.summary: Changes the email address that is bound to a member.

CreateControlPolicy.title: CreateControlPolicy
CreateControlPolicy.summary: Creates a custom access control policy.

CreatePolicyVersion.title: CreatePolicyVersion
CreatePolicyVersion.summary: Creates a version for a policy.

CreateResourceAccount.title: CreateResourceAccount
CreateResourceAccount.summary: Creates a member of the resource account type.

DeleteAccount.title: DeleteAccount
DeleteAccount.summary: Deletes a member of the resource account type.

DeletePolicyVersion.title: DeletePolicyVersion
DeletePolicyVersion.summary: Deletes a version of a permission policy.

DeregisterDelegatedAdministrator.title: DeregisterDelegatedAdministrator
DeregisterDelegatedAdministrator.summary: Removes a delegated administrator account for a trusted service.

DestroyResourceDirectory.title: DestroyResourceDirectory
DestroyResourceDirectory.summary: Disables a resource directory. This operation cannot be undone. Therefore, exercise caution when you perform it.

DetachPolicy.title: DetachPolicy
DetachPolicy.summary: Detaches a policy from an object. After you detach a policy from an object, the object does not have the operation permissions on the current resource group or the resources under the current account.

DisableAssociatedTransfer.title: DisableAssociatedTransfer
DisableAssociatedTransfer.summary: Disables the Transfer Associated Resources feature.

EnableAssociatedTransfer.title: EnableAssociatedTransfer
EnableAssociatedTransfer.summary: Enables the Transfer Associated Resources feature.

GetAccount.title: GetAccount
GetAccount.summary: Queries the information of a member.

GetAccountDeletionCheckResult.title: GetAccountDeletionCheckResult
GetAccountDeletionCheckResult.summary: Queries the result of a member deletion check.

GetControlPolicy.title: GetControlPolicy
GetControlPolicy.summary: Queries the details of an access control policy.

GetControlPolicyEnablementStatus.title: GetControlPolicyEnablementStatus
GetControlPolicyEnablementStatus.summary: Queries the status of the Control Policy feature.

GetFolder.title: GetFolder
GetFolder.summary: Queries the information of a folder.

GetHandshake.title: GetHandshake
GetHandshake.summary: Queries the information of an invitation.

GetPayerForAccount.title: GetPayerForAccount
GetPayerForAccount.summary: Queries the information of a settlement account.

GetPolicy.title: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.summary: Queries the information of a policy.

GetPolicyVersion.title: GetPolicyVersion
GetPolicyVersion.summary: Queries the information of a specified policy version.

GetResourceDirectory.title: GetResourceDirectory
GetResourceDirectory.summary: Queries the information of a resource directory. If you use a management account to call this API operation, the system returns the information of the resource directory that is enabled by using the management account. If you use a member to call this operation, the system returns the information of

GetResourceGroup.title: GetResourceGroup
GetResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information of a resource group.

GetRole.title: GetRole
GetRole.summary: Queries the information of a RAM role.

GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus.title: GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus
GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus.summary: Query the status of the deletion task for a service linked role.

InitResourceDirectory.title: InitResourceDirectory
InitResourceDirectory.summary: Enables a resource directory. After you enable a resource directory, the system automatically creates a root folder and sets the current account as the enterprise management account of the resource directory. The enterprise management account has all administrative permissions on this resource direc

InviteAccountToResourceDirectory.title: InviteAccountToResourceDirectory
InviteAccountToResourceDirectory.summary: Invites an account to join a resource directory.

ListAccounts.title: ListAccounts
ListAccounts.summary: Queries all the members in a resource directory.

ListAccountsForParent.title: ListAccountsForParent
ListAccountsForParent.summary: Queries the information of members in a folder.

ListAncestors.title: ListAncestors
ListAncestors.summary: Queries the information of all the parent folders of a specified folder. The system returns the information of the folders based on their top-down hierarchy.

ListAssociatedTransferSetting.title: ListAssociatedTransferSetting
ListAssociatedTransferSetting.summary: Queries the settings of the Transfer Associated Resources feature.

ListControlPolicyAttachmentsForTarget.title: ListControlPolicyAttachmentsForTarget
ListControlPolicyAttachmentsForTarget.summary: Queries the access control policies that are attached to a folder or member.

ListDelegatedServicesForAccount.title: ListDelegatedServicesForAccount
ListDelegatedServicesForAccount.summary: Queries the trusted services for which a member is specified as a delegated administrator account.

ListFoldersForParent.title: ListFoldersForParent
ListFoldersForParent.summary: Queries the information of all subfolders of a folder.

ListHandshakesForAccount.title: ListHandshakesForAccount
ListHandshakesForAccount.summary: Queries the invitations that are associated with an account.

ListHandshakesForResourceDirectory.title: ListHandshakesForResourceDirectory
ListHandshakesForResourceDirectory.summary: Queries invitations in a resource directory.

ListPolicyVersions.title: ListPolicyVersions
ListPolicyVersions.summary: Queries the versions of a policy.

ListResources.title: ListResources
ListResources.summary: Queries resources that can be accessed by the current account in resource groups.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resource groups or the members in a resource directory.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of a tag key.

ListTargetAttachmentsForControlPolicy.title: ListTargetAttachmentsForControlPolicy
ListTargetAttachmentsForControlPolicy.summary: Queries the objects to which a specific control policy is attached.

ListTrustedServiceStatus.title: ListTrustedServiceStatus
ListTrustedServiceStatus.summary: Queries the trusted services that are enabled within an enterprise management account or delegated administrator account.

MoveAccount.title: MoveAccount
MoveAccount.summary: Moves a member account from a folder to another.

MoveResources.title: MoveResources
MoveResources.summary: Moves resources from one resource group to another. You can move multiple resources that reside in different regions, are used by different Alibaba Cloud services, or belong to different resource groups.

PromoteResourceAccount.title: PromoteResourceAccount
PromoteResourceAccount.summary: Upgrades a resource account to a cloud account.

RegisterDelegatedAdministrator.title: RegisterDelegatedAdministrator
RegisterDelegatedAdministrator.summary: Specifies a member in a resource directory as a delegated administrator account of a trusted service.

RemoveCloudAccount.title: RemoveCloudAccount
RemoveCloudAccount.summary: Removes a member of the cloud account type. After you remove a member of the cloud account type, the member is no longer managed by the management account of the resource directory to which the member belonged.

ResendCreateCloudAccountEmail.title: ResendCreateCloudAccountEmail
ResendCreateCloudAccountEmail.summary: Resends an email that is used to confirm the creation of a cloud account.

ResendPromoteResourceAccountEmail.title: ResendPromoteResourceAccountEmail
ResendPromoteResourceAccountEmail.summary: Resends an email that is used to confirm the upgrade from a resource account to a cloud account.

RetryChangeAccountEmail.title: RetryChangeAccountEmail
RetryChangeAccountEmail.summary: Resends a verification email for the email address change of a member.

SendVerificationCodeForBindSecureMobileP.title: SendVerificationCodeForBindSecureMobilePhone
SendVerificationCodeForBindSecureMobileP.summary: Sends a verification code to the mobile phone number that you want to bind to a resource account in a resource directory for security purposes.

SendVerificationCodeForEnableRD.title: SendVerificationCodeForEnableRD
SendVerificationCodeForEnableRD.summary: Sends a verification code to the mobile phone number bound to a newly created account when you use the account to enable a resource directory.

SetDefaultPolicyVersion.title: SetDefaultPolicyVersion
SetDefaultPolicyVersion.summary: Sets the default version for a policy.

SetMemberDeletionPermission.title: SetMemberDeletionPermission
SetMemberDeletionPermission.summary: Enables or disables the member deletion feature.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to resource groups or the members in a resource directory.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from resource groups or the members in a resource directory.

UpdateAccount.title: UpdateAccount
UpdateAccount.summary: Changes the display name of a member, or switches the type of a member.

UpdateAssociatedTransferSetting.title: UpdateAssociatedTransferSetting
UpdateAssociatedTransferSetting.summary: Updates the settings of the Transfer Associated Resources feature.

UpdateControlPolicy.title: UpdateControlPolicy
UpdateControlPolicy.summary: Updates a custom access control policy.

UpdateFolder.title: UpdateFolder
UpdateFolder.summary: Changes the name of a folder.

UpdateResourceGroup.title: UpdateResourceGroup
UpdateResourceGroup.summary: Updates the basic information of a resource group.

UpdateRole.title: UpdateRole
UpdateRole.summary: Updates the information of a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.
